석유 및 가스 플랜트 기자재 설계 및 제작을 통해 국내외에 공급.

최근 신재생에너지 및 환경 설비로 사업을 다각화,

해양 및 육상 플랜트를 동시에 다룰 수 있는 기술력과 높은 영업이익률을 바탕으로,

세계 시장에서 견고한 입지를 구축하고 있으며, 신규 수주와 성장성이 기대.

단기 급등기의 변동성, 실적 연결 및 외부 변수 리스크도 병행 점검하며,

images.alt: Black and white inked artwork of the world map for Name Her Holy of the Vale. The map is of planets in a small galaxy all circling one gleaming planet called Risa at the center. Around it circles the larger planets Opheris, Natuul, Lida, Indus, Vestanae & Thero. The smaller planets, known as Ports are Chara, Enruhk, Tibor, Barsar and Diomera. As well as a small dot marked Naos, two blacked out planets called the Lost and one very large black void called the Hallowed. The frame around this oval shaped map depicts two Vald’lysa as maidens with braided hair and wings looking down over the Vale. One with a spear, the other with a burning sensor of aether ash. Below are scenes of the sun through a cathedral rooftop on Risa, the other is the floating islands over water on Lida with the many moons in her night sky.

value.text: When people say that you can use ChatGPT to “generate ideas” I’m like. No writers room has ever suffered from a lack of ideas. The more ideas you have the less time you have to actually develop those ideas. Speed is not everything. More is not always better.

images.alt:
The surgery is in three days, he thought desperately. Please don't let me die. Please. I just need another year. I just need another chance.
I just want to win.
I just want the title.
Please don't let me die.
Please. Just give me another chance.
Everything went black.
Haoyu could no longer feel himself falling. Instead he felt suspended, weightless--like he was floating, but without any water to account for it.
Somewhere far away, or maybe somewhere inside his own head, he heard a voice.
"Another chance," the voice said, echoing and overlapping on itself so much Haoyu couldn't tell if it was a man or woman, young or old, high or low. "Very well. I will give you another chance.
"I will give you all the chances in all the worlds."

record.text: Anyone have any idea of how to get hold of expired ABC content? Specifically this: https://www.abc.net.au/listen/radionational/archived/airplay/watermark-by-alana-valentine/3018132

external.description: Watermark is a chronicle of both the physical and psychological devastation of flood in the Northern Territory town of Katherine on 26 January 1998. Based on written and oral testimony from flood survivors, the play evokes the power and torment of flood damage in a small town -- the tensions and griefs, the friendships and kindnesses, the fears and losses. Held together by a beautiful poetic narration which personifies the river as it swells and swamps, Watermark was originally performed in Katherine on the 10th anniversary of the emergency. This radio version takes us on an immersive auditory experience, so realistic that we can almost smell the mud and see the struggling, drowning wildlife in the swollen Katherine River. Uplifting, moving and very funny, Watermark is a testament to both the fragility and the endurance of community in times of hardship
external.title: Watermark by Alana Valentine - ABC Radio National
